sqlMap.select: SELECT STUDENT_TEST_HISTORY_ID as studentTestHistoryId, TEST_ROSTER_ID as testRosterId, CUSTOMER_ID as customerId, TEST_ADMIN_ID as testAdminId, TEST_COMPLETION_STATUS as testCompletionStatus, STUDENT_ID as studentId, START_DATE_TIME as startDateTime, COMPLETION_DATE_TIME as completionDateTime, TEST_NAME as testName, TEST_ADMIN_NAME as testAdminName, TEST_CATALOG_ID as testCatalogId, TEST_ITEM_SET_ID as testItemSetId, PRODUCT_ID as productId, PRODUCT_NAME as productName, PRODUCT_TYPE as productType, TEST_VALIDATION_STATUS as testValidationStatus, TEST_VALIDATION_UPDATED_BY as testValidationUpdatedBy, TEST_VALIDATION_UPDATED_DATE as testValidationUpdatedDate, TEST_VALIDATION_UPDATED_NOTE as testValidationUpdatedNote, LEXINGTON_VERSION as lexingtonVersion, TUTORIAL_ID as tutorialId, USER_NAME as userName, LAST_NAME as lastName, FIRST_NAME as firstName, MIDDLE_NAME as middleName, PREFIX as prefix, SUFFIX as suffix, BIRTHDATE as birthdate, GENDER as gender, ETHNICITY as ethnicity, EMAIL as email, GRADE as grade, AGE as age, EXT_PIN1 as extPin1, EXT_PIN2 as extPin2, EXT_PIN3 as extPin3, EXT_SCHOOL_ID as extSchoolId, EXT_ELM_ID as extElmId, CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, SCORING_STATUS as scoringStatus, CREATOR_ORG_NODE_ID as creatorOrgNodeId, PARENT_ORG_NODE_ID as parentOrgNodeId, GRANDPARENT_ORG_NODE_ID as grandparentOrgNodeId, CREATOR_ORG_NODE_NAME as creatorOrgNodeName, PARENT_ORG_NODE_NAME as parentOrgNodeName, GRANDPARENT_ORG_NODE_NAME as grandparentOrgNodeName, CONTACT_NAME as contactName, CONTACT_TYPE as contactType, CONTACT_EMAIL as contactEmail, STREET_LINE1 as streetLine1, STREET_LINE2 as streetLine2, STREET_LINE3 as streetLine3, CITY as city, STATEPR as statepr, COUNTRY as country, ZIPCODE as zipcode, PRIMARY_PHONE as primaryPhone, SECONDARY_PHONE as secondaryPhone, FAX as fax, SCHEDULER_USER_ID as schedulerUserId, SCHEDULER_USER_NAME as schedulerUserName, ATS_ARCHIVE as atsArchive, STUDENT_ORG_NODE_ID as studentOrgNodeId, CAPTURE_METHOD as captureMethod, ATS_STUDENT_ORG_NODE_ID as atsStudentOrgNodeId FROM STUDENT_TEST_HISTORY WHERE STUDENT_TEST_HISTORY_ID = #studentTestHistoryId:NUMERIC#

SELECT STUDENT_TEST_HISTORY_ID as studentTestHistoryId, TEST_ROSTER_ID as testRosterId, CUSTOMER_ID as customerId, TEST_ADMIN_ID as testAdminId, TEST_COMPLETION_STATUS as testCompletionStatus, STUDENT_ID as studentId, START_DATE_TIME as startDateTime, COMPLETION_DATE_TIME as completionDateTime, TEST_NAME as testName, TEST_ADMIN_NAME as testAdminName, TEST_CATALOG_ID as testCatalogId, TEST_ITEM_SET_ID as testItemSetId, PRODUCT_ID as productId, PRODUCT_NAME as productName, TEST_VALIDATION_STATUS as testValidationStatus, TEST_VALIDATION_UPDATED_BY as testValidationUpdatedBy, TEST_VALIDATION_UPDATED_DATE as testValidationUpdatedDate, TEST_VALIDATION_UPDATED_NOTE as testValidationUpdatedNote, LEXINGTON_VERSION as lexingtonVersion, TUTORIAL_ID as tutorialId, USER_NAME as userName, LAST_NAME as lastName, FIRST_NAME as firstName, MIDDLE_NAME as middleName, PREFIX as prefix, SUFFIX as suffix, BIRTHDATE as birthdate, GENDER as gender, ETHNICITY as ethnicity, EMAIL as email, GRADE as grade, AGE as age, EXT_PIN1 as extPin1, EXT_PIN2 as extPin2, EXT_PIN3 as extPin3, EXT_SCHOOL_ID as extSchoolId, EXT_ELM_ID as extElmId, CUSTOMER_NAME as customerName, CREATED_DATE_TIME as createdDateTime, SCORING_STATUS as scoringStatus, CREATOR_ORG_NODE_ID as creatorOrgNodeId, PARENT_ORG_NODE_ID as parentOrgNodeId, GRANDPARENT_ORG_NODE_ID as grandparentOrgNodeId, CREATOR_ORG_NODE_NAME as creatorOrgNodeName, PARENT_ORG_NODE_NAME as parentOrgNodeName, GRANDPARENT_ORG_NODE_NAME as grandparentOrgNodeName, CONTACT_NAME as contactName, CONTACT_TYPE as contactType, CONTACT_EMAIL as contactEmail, STREET_LINE1 as streetLine1, STREET_LINE2 as streetLine2, STREET_LINE3 as streetLine3, CITY as city, STATEPR as statepr, COUNTRY as country, ZIPCODE as zipcode, PRIMARY_PHONE as primaryPhone, SECONDARY_PHONE as secondaryPhone, FAX as fax, SCHEDULER_USER_ID as schedulerUserId, SCHEDULER_USER_NAME as schedulerUserName, ATS_ARCHIVE as atsArchive, STUDENT_ORG_NODE_ID as studentOrgNodeId, CAPTURE_METHOD as captureMethod, ATS_STUDENT_ORG_NODE_ID as atsStudentOrgNodeId, PRODUCT_TYPE as productType FROM STUDENT_TEST_HISTORY WHERE TEST_ROSTER_ID = #testRosterId:NUMERIC#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO STUDENT_TEST_HISTORY ( TEST_ROSTER_ID, CUSTOMER_ID, TEST_ADMIN_ID, TEST_COMPLETION_STATUS, STUDENT_ID, START_DATE_TIME, COMPLETION_DATE_TIME, TEST_NAME, TEST_ADMIN_NAME, #studentId:NUMERIC#, #startDateTime:TIMESTAMP#, #completionDateTime:TIMESTAMP#, #testName:VARCHAR#, #testAdminName:VARCHAR#, #testCatalogId:NUMERIC#, #testItemSetId:NUMERIC#, #productId:NUMERIC#, #productName:VARCHAR#, #productType:VARCHAR#, #testValidationStatus:VARCHAR#, #testValidationUpdatedBy:NUMERIC#, #testValidationUpdatedDate:TIMESTAMP#, #testValidationUpdatedNote:VARCHAR#, #lexingtonVersion:VARCHAR#, #tutorialId:NUMERIC#, #userName:VARCHAR#, #lastName:VARCHAR#, #firstName:VARCHAR#, #middleName:VARCHAR#, #prefix:VARCHAR#, #suffix:VARCHAR#, #birthdate:TIMESTAMP#, #gender:VARCHAR#, #ethnicity:VARCHAR#, #email:VARCHAR#, #grade:VARCHAR#, #age:NUMERIC#, #extPin1:VARCHAR#, #extPin2:VARCHAR#, #extPin3:VARCHAR#, #extSchoolId:VARCHAR#, #extElmId:VARCHAR#, #parentOrgNodeName:VARCHAR#, #grandparentOrgNodeName:VARCHAR#, #contactName:VARCHAR#, #contactType:VARCHAR#, #contactEmail:VARCHAR#, #streetLine1:VARCHAR#, #streetLine2:VARCHAR#, #streetLine3:VARCHAR#, #city:VARCHAR#, #statepr:VARCHAR#, #country:VARCHAR#, #zipcode:VARCHAR#, #primaryPhone:VARCHAR#, #secondaryPhone:VARCHAR#, #fax:VARCHAR#, #schedulerUserId:NUMERIC#, #schedulerUserName:VARCHAR#, #atsArchive:VARCHAR#, #studentOrgNodeId:NUMERIC#, #captureMethod:VARCHAR#, #atsStudentOrgNodeId:NUMERIC# )
